mapper.insert: insert into Comment (problem_number, user_number, comment_content) values(#{problem_number}, #{user_number}, #{comment_content})
mapper.select: select Comment.comment_number, Comment.problem_number, Comment.user_number, Comment.comment_content, Comment.created_at, Comment.updated_at, Comment.likes, User.name from Comment left join User on Comment.user_number = User.user_number where problem_number = #{problem_number} order by comment_number desc
